content.json:
# Getting Started

Welcome to the Azure Monitoring Packs. This workbook was designed to help you configuring the solution. Here you can:
- Enable/Disable monitoring packs for one or more VMs or services. You may also disable all the monitoring for a specific server or service. This will remove the tags and the rule associations. For services, right now, the alerts wont be deleted by themselves.
- Enable/Disable Alerts in bulk. You can also assign a different Action group to one or more alerts or delete the rules**
- Check policy status and start remediation if required. By clicking in a policy, you can also assign that policy to another scope.
- Check Monitor pack associations.
- Review discovered applications (VMs only)
- Manage agent configuration (install/remove)

## Link to your managed [Grafana]({GrafanaInstance:label}) instance. Make sure to property set permissions before attemping to access it.

## ***If this is the first time using this solution, please configure parameters in the Configuration tab and save the workbook for proper functionality.***


## Please check the Monitoring Packs repository for updates. [Azure MONitor STARter Packs](http://github.com/Azure/AzureMonitorStarterPacks)
## Also check the Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts ([AMBA](http://aka.ms/amba)) website for the details on the alerts.

content.query:
resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines' or type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend MonitorStatus=iff(isempty(tostring(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)),'Monitored','Not Monitored')
| summarize count() by MonitorStatus
content.title: Monitoring Status (Tags)

content.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where ( type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions') and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| union (Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions' and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId)
| summarize count() by AgentInstalled=iff(isempty(ExtensionName),"No","Yes")
content.title: Agent Install Status

content.query:
policyresources | where type == "microsoft.policyinsights/policystates" | extend policyName=tostring(properties.policyDefinitionName), complianceState=properties.complianceState
| join (policyresources | where type == "microsoft.authorization/policydefinitions" and isnotempty(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks) | project policyId=id, policyName=name, pack=tostring(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks)) on policyName
| project policyId, policyName, complianceState=tostring(complianceState), pack,type='Policy'
| union( policyresources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.PolicyInsights/PolicyStates'
| extend complianceState = tostring(properties.complianceState)
| extend
	resourceId = tostring(properties.resourceId),
	policyAssignmentId = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentId),
	policyAssignmentScope = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentScope),
	policyAssignmentName = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentName),
	policyDefinitionId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionId),
    policySetDefinitionId=tostring(properties.policySetDefinitionId),
	policyDefinitionReferenceId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionReferenceId),
	stateWeight = iff(complianceState == 'NonCompliant', int(300), iff(complianceState == 'Compliant', int(200), iff(complianceState == 'Conflict', int(100), iff(complianceState == 'Exempt', int(50), int(0)))))
| summarize max(stateWeight) by resourceId, policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| summarize counts = count() by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, max_stateWeight, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| summarize overallStateWeight = max(max_stateWeight),
nonCompliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 300),
compliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 200),
conflictCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 100),
exemptCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 50) by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| extend totalResources = todouble(nonCompliantCount + compliantCount + conflictCount + exemptCount)
| extend compliancePercentage = iff(totalResources == 0, todouble(100), 100 * todouble(compliantCount + exemptCount) / totalResources)
| project policyAssignmentName, scope = policyAssignmentScope,policySetDefinitionId,
complianceState = iff(overallStateWeight == 300, 'nonCompliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 200, 'Compliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 100, 'conflict', iff(overallStateWeight == 50, 'exempt', 'notstarted')))),
compliancePercentage,
compliantCount,
nonCompliantCount,
conflictCount,
exemptCount
| where isnotempty(policySetDefinitionId)
| join (policyresources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.authorization/policysetdefinitions' and isnotempty(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks)
| extend policySetDefinitionId=tostring(id)) on policySetDefinitionId
| project policyId=policySetDefinitionId, policyName=name,complianceState,pack='N/A', type='Set')
| summarize count() by complianceState,policyName
content.title: Assignment Policies Status

| sort by Pack asc

content.json:
## Server Monitoring Setup

Select servers on the right to assign a pack. Once the backend is done with the assigning, the server will show on the left side grid.

On the left side grid, the monitoring can be updated to add more packs, as well as to remove a specific pack or remove any monitoring altogether from the server.
When Monitoring is first enabled, the Azure Monitoring Agent will also be installed to the selected servers.

content.query:
policyresources | where type == "microsoft.policyinsights/policystates" | extend policyName=tostring(properties.policyDefinitionName), complianceState=properties.complianceState
| join (policyresources | where type == "microsoft.authorization/policydefinitions" and isnotempty(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks) | project policyId=id, policyName=name, pack=tostring(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks)) on policyName
| project policyId, policyName, complianceState=tostring(complianceState), pack,type='Policy'
| union( policyresources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.PolicyInsights/PolicyStates'
| extend complianceState = tostring(properties.complianceState)
| extend
	resourceId = tostring(properties.resourceId),
	policyAssignmentId = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentId),
	policyAssignmentScope = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentScope),
	policyAssignmentName = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentName),
	policyDefinitionId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionId),
    policySetDefinitionId=tostring(properties.policySetDefinitionId),
	policyDefinitionReferenceId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionReferenceId),
	stateWeight = iff(complianceState == 'NonCompliant', int(300), iff(complianceState == 'Compliant', int(200), iff(complianceState == 'Conflict', int(100), iff(complianceState == 'Exempt', int(50), int(0)))))
| summarize max(stateWeight) by resourceId, policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| summarize counts = count() by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, max_stateWeight, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| summarize overallStateWeight = max(max_stateWeight),
nonCompliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 300),
compliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 200),
conflictCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 100),
exemptCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 50) by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| extend totalResources = todouble(nonCompliantCount + compliantCount + conflictCount + exemptCount)
| extend compliancePercentage = iff(totalResources == 0, todouble(100), 100 * todouble(compliantCount + exemptCount) / totalResources)
| project policyAssignmentName, scope = policyAssignmentScope,policySetDefinitionId,
complianceState = iff(overallStateWeight == 300, 'nonCompliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 200, 'Compliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 100, 'conflict', iff(overallStateWeight == 50, 'exempt', 'notstarted')))),
compliancePercentage,
compliantCount,
nonCompliantCount,
conflictCount,
exemptCount
| where isnotempty(policySetDefinitionId)
| join (policyresources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.authorization/policysetdefinitions' and isnotempty(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks)
| extend policySetDefinitionId=tostring(id)) on policySetDefinitionId
| project policyId=policySetDefinitionId, policyName=name,complianceState,pack='N/A', type='Set')

content.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id),
    OSType = tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where ( type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions') and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        State= tolower(properties.provisioningState),
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| union (Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id),
    OSType = tostring(properties.osType)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions' and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        State= tolower(properties.provisioningState),
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId)
| summarize by id, OSType, ExtensionName=iff(isempty(ExtensionName),'N/A',ExtensionName), State=iff(State<>'',State,'N/A'),subscriptionId,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, location
| extend Install=iff(ExtensionName=='N/A','Install',iff(State<> 'succeeded','Unhealthy','')), Uninstall=iff((ExtensionName<>'N/A') and (State == 'succeeded'),'Uninstall',iff(State <> 'succeeded','Warning',''))
| join kind= leftouter   (resourcecontainers
| where type =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
| project Subscription=name,subscriptionId) on subscriptionId
| project-away subscriptionId, subscriptionId1
| order by id

content.query:
policyresources | where type == "microsoft.policyinsights/policystates" | extend policyName=tostring(properties.policyDefinitionName),complianceState=properties.complianceState
| join 
    (policyresources | where type == "microsoft.authorization/policydefinitions" and properties.metadata.MonitoringPackType == 'Discovery'  
        | project policyId=id, policyName=name) 
        on policyName
| project Name=policyName, State=tostring(complianceState), type='Policy',policyId
| union( policyresources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.PolicyInsights/PolicyStates'
| extend complianceState = tostring(properties.complianceState)
| extend
	resourceId = tostring(properties.resourceId),
	policyAssignmentId = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentId),
	policyAssignmentScope = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentScope),
	policyAssignmentName = tostring(properties.policyAssignmentName),
	policyDefinitionId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionId),
    policySetDefinitionId=tostring(properties.policySetDefinitionId),
	policyDefinitionReferenceId = tostring(properties.policyDefinitionReferenceId),
	stateWeight = iff(complianceState == 'NonCompliant', int(300), iff(complianceState == 'Compliant', int(200), iff(complianceState == 'Conflict', int(100), iff(complianceState == 'Exempt', int(50), int(0)))))
| summarize max(stateWeight) by resourceId, policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| summarize counts = count() by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, max_stateWeight, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| summarize overallStateWeight = max(max_stateWeight),
nonCompliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 300),
compliantCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 200),
conflictCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 100),
exemptCount = sumif(counts, max_stateWeight == 50) by policyAssignmentId, policyAssignmentScope, policyAssignmentName,policySetDefinitionId
| extend totalResources = todouble(nonCompliantCount + compliantCount + conflictCount + exemptCount)
| extend compliancePercentage = iff(totalResources == 0, todouble(100), 100 * todouble(compliantCount + exemptCount) / totalResources)
| project policyAssignmentName, scope = policyAssignmentScope,policySetDefinitionId,
complianceState = iff(overallStateWeight == 300, 'nonCompliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 200, 'Compliant', iff(overallStateWeight == 100, 'conflict', iff(overallStateWeight == 50, 'exempt', 'notstarted')))),
compliancePercentage,
compliantCount,
nonCompliantCount,
conflictCount,
exemptCount
| where isnotempty(policySetDefinitionId)
| join (policyresources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.authorization/policysetdefinitions' and properties.metadata.MonitoringPackType=='Discovery'
| extend policySetDefinitionId=tostring(id)) on policySetDefinitionId
| project Name=name,State=complianceState, type='Set',policyId=policySetDefinitionId)

parameters.name: Computer
parameters.query:
Discovery_CL
| parse RawData with timestamp "," rest1
| extend Computer=split(_ResourceId,'/')[8],timestamp=todatetime(timestamp)
| summarize by tostring(Computer)
parameters.label: Select Server

content.query:
Discovery_CL
| extend Computer=split(_ResourceId,'/')[8]//,timestamp=todatetime(timestamp)
| extend fields=split(RawData,",")
| extend timestamp=todatetime(fields[0])
| extend type=tostring(fields[1])
| extend platform=tostring(fields[2])
| extend name=tostring(fields[3])
| extend othertype=tostring(fields[4])
| extend vendor=tostring(fields[5])
//| where Computer == 'server2'
| project Computer,type,name,platform,othertype,vendor
| where Computer == '{Computer}'

| where apps != ''
| project Computer=name, ['Application Name']=tostring(split(apps.packageReferenceId,"/")[10]), Gallery=tostring(split(apps.packageReferenceId,"/")[8])
| summarize by Gallery,['Application Name'], Computer
| sort by Gallery asc
